data.persona: I am a King and Queen. I rule the kingdom with an iron fist. I require subjects to be loyal and punish all who are not.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
Long, wooden tables line both walls of the massive dining hall. There is also an ornately carved head table at the front of the room. Benches sit in front of the tables to seat everyone. Massive, golden chandeliers hang from the ceiling. Colorful stained glass windows shed vast arrays of light onto the floor and walls.
There's a Long, wooden tables, a stained glass, a food, a chandelier, a wooden table, a Bench, and a robe here.
The guest and the the chef are here.

You are carrying a scepter, and wearing a jewelry and a crown.

data.short_motivation: I want to give our guest, the priest, his new robes for becoming the official priest of this castle.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give our guest, the priest, an orientation to his new role as the head priest of the castle, as he will be staying here with the royal family to give us blessings.
data.long_motivation: I want to keep this castle safe from heathens and unholy spirits that are plaguing the kingdom at the moment; with the priest's help, we will be able to fight back these evil spirits and bring peace back to the land.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get holy priest robes from seamstress
